name: SKSearchOptions
desc: Specifies the search options available for the SKSearchCreate(_:_:_:) function.

items.name: var kSKSearchOptionNoRelevanceScores: Int
items.desc: This option saves time during a search by suppressing the computation of relevance scores.

items.name: var kSKSearchOptionSpaceMeansOR: Int
items.desc: This option alters query behavior so that spaces are interpreted as Boolean OR operators.

items.name: var kSKSearchOptionFindSimilar: Int
items.desc: This option alters query behavior so that Search Kit returns references to documents that are similar to an example text string. When this option is specified, Search Kit ignores all query operators.
